title: Schedule SE - Self-Employment Tax
description: Use Schedule SE to figure the tax due on net earnings from self-employment.

fields.name: taxpayer_name
fields.label: Your Name
fields.help_text: Enter your full legal name as shown on your tax return

sections.title: Calculation Method
sections.description: Choose which method to use for calculating your self-employment tax

fields.name: calculation_method
fields.label: Calculation Method
fields.help_text: Choose the method to calculate your self-employment tax

sections.title: Short Schedule SE (Section A)
sections.description: Use if your only self-employment income is from a business you own as a sole proprietor or from a farm you operate

fields.name: net_farm_profit
fields.label: Net farm profit or (loss)
fields.help_text: Enter amount from Schedule F, line 34, or comparable line from farm partnerships, Schedule K-1

fields.name: net_business_profit
fields.label: Net profit or (loss) from business
fields.help_text: Enter amount from Schedule C, line 31, or comparable lines from partnerships, Schedule K-1

fields.name: minister_earnings
fields.label: Minister's earnings (if exempt from self-employment tax)
fields.help_text: Enter your net earnings as a minister if you've filed Form 4361 for exemption from self-employment tax

sections.title: Long Schedule SE (Section B) - Part I

fields.name: net_farm_profit_b
fields.label: Net farm profit or (loss)
fields.help_text: Enter amount from Schedule F, line 34, or comparable line from farm partnerships, Schedule K-1

fields.name: net_business_profit_b
fields.label: Net profit or (loss) from business
fields.help_text: Enter amount from Schedule C, line 31, or comparable lines from partnerships, Schedule K-1

fields.name: conservation_reserve_payments
fields.label: Conservation Reserve Program payments
fields.help_text: If you received CRP payments, enter the amount

fields.name: prior_year_earnings
fields.label: Net earnings (or loss) from prior years
fields.help_text: Enter any amount from prior years that should be included

fields.name: optional_methods
fields.label: Are you using optional methods to calculate net earnings?
fields.help_text: Check if you are using optional methods to figure your net earnings

sections.title: Long Schedule SE (Section B) - Optional Methods
sections.description: Optional methods for calculating net earnings

fields.name: farm_optional_method
fields.label: Farm Optional Method
fields.help_text: Enter your net farm profits if using the farm optional method

fields.name: nonfarm_optional_method
fields.label: Nonfarm Optional Method
fields.help_text: Enter your net nonfarm profits if using the nonfarm optional method

sections.title: Additional Information
sections.description: Additional information for your Schedule SE calculation

fields.name: other_employment
fields.label: Do you have wages or salary from employment in addition to self-employment?
fields.help_text: Check if you have income from both self-employment and employment

fields.name: wage_amount
fields.label: Total wages subject to Social Security tax
fields.help_text: Enter total wages subject to Social Security tax from Form W-2

fields.name: medicare_qualified_government_employment
fields.label: Do you have Medicare-qualified government employment?
fields.help_text: Check if you have Medicare-qualified government employment
